attributes.action: Stop Airlines/Travel companies charging for "Extra Legroom"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm 6 feet 3" and I need extra legroom. Why should I have to pay for this?  There are plently of anti discrimination laws in place to protect an individual's lifestyle choices eg religion, sex, but I have no control over my height. This discrimination should stop or Airlines forced to supply shoehorns and lubricating jelly with immediate effect.
